Uses of CacheListener in org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.cache
 

Subclasses of CacheListener in org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.cache
 class CacheFullListener
          The CacheFullListener is a listener that is interested in ALL events associated with the cache and should be used with caution!
 class CacheIndexListener
          The CacheIndexListener allows for listening to a particular class index within the cache; any changes to the index are reported to this listener.
 

Methods in org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base.cache that return types with arguments of type CacheListener
 java.util.Collection<CacheListener> CacheListenerManager.getInterestedListeners(DMPEvent event)
          Based on the contents of the event, we build a set of listeners that want to be notified.
